text: Abbey is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Bert Abbey (1869–1962), American baseball player * Charles Abbey (1913–1982), Australian politician * David Abbey (born 1941), English cricketer * Edward Abbey (1927–1989), American author * Edwin Austin Abbey (1852–1911), artist and illustrator * George Abbey (NASA) (born 1932), American National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) official * George Abbey (footballer) (born 1978), Nigerian footballer * Graham Abbey (born 1971), Canadian actor * Helen Abbey (1915–2001), American statistician * Henry Abbey (1842–1911), American poet * Henry Eugene Abbey (1846–1896), theatre manager and producer * Joe Abbey (1925–2014), American football player * John Abbey (organ builder) (1785–1859), English organ builder * John Roland Abbey (1894–1969), English book collector * Leon Abbey (1900–1975), American jazz violinist and bandleader * Lynn Abbey (born 1948), American author * Nathan Abbey (born 1978), English football (soccer) player * Robert Mensah Abbey, Ghanaian politician * Ross Abbey (born 1953), Australian rules football player * Zema Abbey (born 1977), English football (soccer) player == References == Category:English-language surnames
title: Abbey (surname)
